description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. What would an alien race do upon arriving on our planet?  Hold sporting events involving death and destruction of course!  Up to four can compete in a one-button contest to wreak the most havoc in three different events: Beating up an unwilling human participant, tossing the most cars on a desert highway, and collecting earthling meat from spaceships above farms.
description.short: What would an alien race do upon arriving on our planet?  Hold sporting events involving death and destruction of course!  Up to four can compete in a one-button contest to wreak the most havoc in three different events: Beating up an unwilling human participant, tossing the most cars on a desert highway, and collecting earthling meat from spaceships above farms.
